step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap.
Try to keep your elbows closer to your head as you raise your hands.
Excellent! You're spreading your elbows wide and keeping your head upright.
Great hold. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Nicely done returning to the start position. Watch your wrists to ensure they stay aligned.
Good clasping. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your body in this position.
Better elbow position this time. Continue raising your hands towards your forehead.
Well done spreading your elbows wide behind your head.
Good hold. Keep your head upright and maintain the elbow spread.
Excellent return to the starting position. Your form was consistent.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright head position throughout.
